message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $160, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I can meet you at $155, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Would you be willing to make it worth my while at this price?
I'm really close to walking away, Alice. I can do $152, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
